Welcome back Kinger. Nice to have you aboard again.

::Shredder::

Shredder approaches slowly, still shocked at who was talking to him, and a bit surprised at being recruited as second-in-command. He looks over the map, and frowns for a second at the question.

"I know of some old Destrons that I could search out," he replies after a few seconds of thought, "And I have several friends amongst the Predacons, although I doubt they would leave thier faction. THe old Destrons, though, are very likely soldiers."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  he stood up. His wings spread. Guiledart stood behind him on the right. God 
> Neptune behind him on the left. Galvatron laughed. "Welcome home Shredder." 
> he walked around the command table and popped up the hologram. It showed all 
> the bases on the planet and the ark base near the moon. he had seen it on his 
> orbit of his spark. "I wish for you to be my second in command. For you are 
> lucky enough to be liveing in a new era. The era of the Destrons. And I shall 
> lead us into that era. With you as my right hand man." he looked over the 
> map. "But we need more soilders. Do you know of anyone?"
> 
> OOC: Hi guys its me Kinger its good to be back and im ready to have some fun.
